Key Match Events: WICKET: Mahmudullah c Markram b Maharaj 20 (Ban 108-6)
Wicket falls. Dot ball. New man on strike.
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Aiden Markram: 'I think it got pretty nerve racking in the final over and it can make you mentally tired.'
Bangladesh captain Najmul Hossain Shanto: 'I think this is a match we should have won.'
Player of the match Heinrich Klaasen: 'It was not a nice one to watch, it was good that the boys got it over the line.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first T20I match between South Africa and Bangladesh.
Others: The match was played in New York.
